amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 44 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996, to require independent audits of private firms whose contracts are made directly with foreign governments and financed with funds made available under the Foreign Military Financing Program.

action.text: Mr. Gilman raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A014). Mr. Gilman stated that the amendment would make changes to existing law and, therefore, constituted legislation on an Appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
